title: James Duddridge – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by James Duddridge, the Conservative MP for Rochford and Southend East, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
I hope you enjoyed your holiday boss [Boris Johnson]. Time to come back. Few issues at the office that need addressing. #bringbackboris
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
